## Data Preprocessing: FASTA and Metadata files were extracted from .tar files obtained from the GISAID database. {data-background="presentation_files/img/PGCSlideLight.svg" transition="fade-in slide-out" transition-speed="slow"}

## Data Preprocessing: A treemap that visualizes the distribution of different  {data-background="presentation_files/img/PGCSlideLight.svg" transition="fade-in slide-out" transition-speed="slow"}

## Data Preprocessing: A stratified random sampler was utilized to obtain a smaller sample of all the sequences available in the GISAID database. {data-background="presentation_files/img/PGCSlideLight.svg" transition="fade-in slide-out" transition-speed="slow"}

## Data Preprocessing: Entries with erroneous metadata entries were filtered from the data set to prevent issues in downstream analysis {data-background="presentation_files/img/PGCSlideLight.svg" transition="fade-in slide-out" transition-speed="slow"}

## Data Preprocessing: Sequences and metadata of preprocessed data can be saved for possible use in further downstream analysis {data-background="presentation_files/img/PGCSlideLight.svg" transition="fade-in slide-out" transition-speed="slow"}

## k-mer analysis: k-mer frequencies can be used to represent a specific sequence for downstream profiling {data-background="presentation_files/img/PGCSlideLight.svg" transition="fade-in slide-out" transition-speed="slow"}

```{r out.width="900px", out.height="450px"}

library(readr)
library(flextable)

p <- read.csv(file="presentation_files/img/kmer_3_100.csv", nrows=10)
p_table <- flextable(p)
p_table
```

## Dimensional-Reduction: PCA analysis is able to reduce the number of dimensions of the highly dimensional k-mer data set using linear reduction{data-background="presentation_files/img/PGCSlideLight.svg" transition="fade-in slide-out" transition-speed="slow"}

::::: {.columns}

:::: {.column width="50%"}
```{r out.width="900px", out.height="450px", fig.cap="Principal Components Plot for k=7"}

load(file="presentation_files/img/pca-7.RData")
p
```
::::

:::: {.column width="50%"}
```{r out.width="900px", out.height="450px", fig.cap="3D Principal Components Plot for k=7"}

load(file="presentation_files/img/3d-pca-7.RData")
p
```
::::

:::::

::::: {.columns}

:::: {.column width="50%"}
